column4: I have s simpletech external harddrive, it shows up in /dev and in device manager, but wont come on the desktop what is up with that, anyone know
did you remove desktop drive icons?

brb gonna log in as root pashaw, kay?

if it still wont appear there listed with the normal drives in fstab then you have more to work with
